Name: Leshy
Equipment_Options: This model is equipped with Wicked Branches.
Faction_Abilities: The selected Formation may not end a move further from this Formation.
The selected Formation may not end a move closer to this Formation.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: Any attack that targets this model is treated as having a Rend Characteristic of 0.

Whenever an enemy Formation attacks this model in the melee combat step you may roll a D6 and attempt to transform into a whirlwind of leaves. On a result of 4+ then the attacking Formation suffers D3 ethereal damage, and this model cannot be selected to fight this step and until the end of the step cannot lose any health.
At the start of the movement step select a non-LEGENDARY enemy Formation within 12" of this model and roll a D6. On a 2+ you may choose one of the following effects to apply to the selected Formation
